name: Mini Gun Man
description:
THIS GAME HAS CONTROLLER SUPPORT

WASD=Movement     SPACE/TRIANGLE=Shock     MOUSE/RIGHT STICK=Aiming

CLICK/R2=Shoot  

NOTE: Mobile only works with controller (I've tried)

Keep Mini Gun Man alive!

The goal is to survive as long as you can. There are three upgrades that come at 10s in and 20s in. You also have a shock wave that recharges every 25 seconds. Much easier with mouse and not touch pad. Shock will help during reloading.

-All code is mine

-Mini gun was from online.

-Try my other games

-Music found from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/action-music/9
